Title: Establishes the middle class tax relief act to exclude overtime wages and income from tips from being included in the New York adjusted gross income of a resident individual
Summary: Establishes the middle class tax relief act; excludes overtime wages and income from tips from being included in the New York adjusted gross income of a resident individual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to excluding overtime wages and income from tips from being included in the New York adjusted gross income of a resident individual
